GG::is_flag_type

GG::is_flag_type< T > Struct Template Reference

Metafunction predicate that evaluates as true iff T is a GG flag type, declared by using GG_FLAG_TYPE. More...

Detailed Description

template<class T>
struct GG::is_flag_type< T >

Metafunction predicate that evaluates as true iff T is a GG flag type, declared by using GG_FLAG_TYPE.
